com.github.flowersinthesand.spheres

Interface Actions<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionsSupport, ConcurrentActions, SimpleActions

    public interface Actions<T>
    A manager for a set of Actions. Inspired by jQuery's Callbacks object.

    There are two main implementations: thread-safe ConcurrentActions and not thread-safe SimpleActions.

    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Actions.Options
      Options to create an Actions.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Action<T> action)
      Adds an action.
      void disable()
      Disables any operation on the actions.
      boolean disabled()
      Determines if the actions has been disabled.
      void empty()
      Removes all of the actions.
      void fire()
      Fire all of the actions.
      void fire(T data)
      Fire all of the actions with the given value.
      boolean fired()
      Determines if the actions have been called at least once.
      boolean has(Action<T> action)
      Determines whether the actions contains the specified action.
      void remove(Action<T> action)
      Removes an action.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(Action<T> action)
        Adds an action.

      • disable

        void disable()
        Disables any operation on the actions. This method is useful when multiple events are mutually exclusive.

        Determines if the actions has been disabled.
